parameters.query: SELECT pm.id as product_id, pm.sku, pm.product_name, pm.title_en, pm.listing_price, pm.image_urls, pm.currency, ROUND((pm.listing_price - COALESCE(im.purchase_price, 0)) / NULLIF(COALESCE(im.purchase_price, 1), 0) * 100, 2) as profit_rate, ml.marketplace_id as marketplace FROM products_master pm LEFT JOIN inventory_master im ON im.product_master_id = pm.id AND im.user_id = pm.user_id LEFT JOIN marketplace_listings ml ON ml.product_master_id = pm.id AND ml.user_id = pm.user_id WHERE pm.id = ANY(ARRAY[$1]::integer[]) AND pm.user_id = $2 AND ROUND((pm.listing_price - COALESCE(im.purchase_price, 0)) / NULLIF(COALESCE(im.purchase_price, 1), 0) * 100, 2) >= $3

INSERT INTO media_queue (product_id, user_id, image_urls, title_en, listing_price, currency, marketplace, profit_rate, status, created_at, updated_at) VALUES ($1, $2, $3::jsonb, $4, $5, $6, $7, $8, 'pending', NOW(), NOW()) ON CONFLICT (product_id, user_id) DO UPDATE SET image_urls = EXCLUDED.image_urls, title_en = EXCLUDED.title_en, listing_price = EXCLUDED.listing_price, profit_rate = EXCLUDED.profit_rate, status = CASE WHEN media_queue.status IN ('completed', 'failed') THEN 'pending' ELSE media_queue.status END, updated_at = NOW() RETURNING id, product_id, status
DELETE FROM media_queue WHERE status IN ('completed', 'failed') AND created_at < NOW() - INTERVAL '7 days' AND user_id = $1;
